name: media-file-explorer-share

requests.name: Share text (text_or_url)
requests.description: Share a text payload via JSON. The text_or_url field is detected and formatted as Markdown for the email.

requests.name: Share Markdown text

body.body:
{
    "text_or_url": "# Bug Report

## Steps to reproduce

1. Open the app
2. Tap **Share**
3. Select a file larger than 50 MB

## Expected

File is uploaded.

## Actual

`Error 413` is returned.

---
*Device: Pixel 8, Android 15*"
}

requests.description: Share Markdown-formatted text. The handler renders it as HTML in the email notification.

requests.name: Share URL
requests.description: Share a URL via the text_or_url field.

requests.name: Share custom fields (no text_or_url)
requests.description: Send arbitrary key-value fields without text_or_url. Rendered as a table in the email.

requests.name: Share file upload
requests.description: Upload a file via multipart form-data. Select a file in Hoppscotch before sending. The file is emailed as attachment and/or saved to storage.

requests.name: Share plain text

body.body:
This is a plain-text payload.
It will be sent as a plain-text email with request metadata.

requests.description: Send a plain-text body (non-JSON). Falls back to plain-text email with metadata.

requests.name: Share text with Basic Auth
requests.description: Share text with Basic Auth enabled. Requires auth_enabled=true in config/app.php.

requests.name: Error: empty body
requests.description: Send an empty POST body. Should return HTTP 400 'Empty body'.

requests.name: Error: GET method not allowed
requests.description: GET request to share.php. Should return HTTP 405 'Method Not Allowed'.
